library:
PickIk kinematics plugin.
<class name="cached_ik_kinematics_plugin/CachedPickIkPlugin" type="cached_ik_kinematics_plugin::CachedIKKinematicsPlugin" base_class_type="kinematics::KinematicsBase">
Kinematics plugin for persistently caching IK solutions computed with the PickIk kinematics plugin.
